about_the_game:
ARIA CHRONICLE has a new Hero!
The Amazon will be joining Latebra’s Tavern!

The “Amazon” is a supporter, also possessing proficiency as an attacker, utilizing arrows and transformation skills. They can strengthen and heal allies in addition to obstructing enemy movements using arrow skills. Once they transform into a leopard, they will move to the front line to tear into the enemy. They stand up against the enemy with remarkable dodging skills and a thick skin coat.

They can use skills such as “Arrows of Light and Dark”, that enables an attack of both light and dark elements, “Exterminative Shot” that produces a powerful shot of arrows against multiple enemies, and “Rain of Healing” that can shoot arrows infused with healing power.
By shifting into the form of a leopard, they will move to the front line, if there is an opening, and visa-versa by shifting back to human form.
Some skills can be used only when they shift into the form of a leopard.
The Amazon is a versatile Hero who can give buffs to your allies and take the form of both human and leopard.



Content of the DLC
Addition of the new Hero, Amazon.
The Amazon will appear on your List of Hireable Heroes when you visit the tavern.
The Amazon will be added to the list of jobs that can be chosen for Aria.
